import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect' import {selectCartItems,selectCartTotal} from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import checkoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.component' import './checkout.styles.scss' import CartItem from '../../components/cart-item/cart-item.component' const CheckoutPage = ({cartItems,total}) => (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{cartItems.map(cartItem => ())}
TOTAL: ${total}
) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems:selectCartItems, total: selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutPage);
